pageContext.description: Casting rib down center of both sides. Loop broken off; flanges broken away.
pageContext.patina: Green patina flaked off in places, showing powdery greenish-white surface underneath.
pageContext.associations: Part of a hoard of 14 Palstaves of somewhat similar type.
pageContext.collection: University College of Wales Museum, Aberystwyth,Given by Col. Norton, Feby 1913,NMW 47.164/M8
pageContext.site: wales,powys (montgomeryshire),nant saeson on myndd tal-y-glanan,south of afon dugoed,about 1905
pageContext.museumCollection: University College of Wales Museum, Aberystwyth
